name: Middle Management
description:
With your career hanging in the balance, High Command has commissioned you with maintaining control over Human Colony #K789.  Can you squeeze enough biofuel from your unwilling workers to save your career? Or will humanity spiral out of your control?

Middle Management is a top down action game where you control an alien mind control drone. Keep the humans slaves blissfully ignorant in their harvesting to collect biofuel and purchase upgrades, or suffer the revolutionary and explosive consequences of a fully awakened human colony.  Balance purchasing upgrades and trying to reach your target fuel count before your drone is overwhelmed in a roguelike style progression.

Featuring dozens of unique dialogues and one very deadly variety of grenade.

Developed in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 (Theme: Out of Control). All art created by the developer for the jam. Music by Nihilore (nihilore.com/license).

While Middle Management does play in browser, downloading the windows executable below is recommended for the full cinematic experience.
